department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Required 3 year contract with 2 additional 1 year option periods.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for janitorial services at Canadian Forces Maritime Experimental and Test Ranges, Winchelsea Island, and Nanaimo Military Camp.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Title and Solicitation Number**
-----------------------------

### W684B-220011: Janitorial Services for Nanaimo Military Camp and Canadian Forces Maritime Experimental and Test Ranges

**Notice Type**
---------------

* **French:** Demande de Proposals
* **English:** Request for Proposals (RFP)

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3942250490
* **Publication Date:** March 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 1, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** July 1, 2026
* **Tender Status:** Expired

**Project Background**
-------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services for the Canadian Forces Maritime Experimental and Test Ranges, Winchelsea Island, and the Nanaimo Military Camp. This will be a 3-year contract with options to extend for an additional 2 years.

**Instructions to Respondents**
-----------------------------

Please visit the following website to access the solicitation documents and to submit your proposal:
<http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15849943?extsite=MTU4NDk5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Katye Wong**
	+ Email: katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Solicitation Documents

Solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposals (RFP) and any other related attachments, are available for download on the specified website. Potential contractors are responsible for their own costs and for ensuring that their proposals meet the requirements and specifications outlined in the RFP. The department will not provide accommodations or language support for contractors.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

All contracts issued under this solicitation will comply with the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* ... (And all other trade agreements listed above)

### Government of Canada Disclaimer

* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is not responsible for any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies that may appear in the contents of this notice
